Identification.LongTitle: Refund of Duties on Obsolete or Surplus Goods Regulations

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of National Revenue, pursuant to section 112 of the Customs Tariffa, hereby makes the annexed Refund of Duties on Obsolete or Surplus Goods Regulations.

Subsection.Text: Subject to subsection (2), an application for a refund under section 110 of the Customs Tariff must be accompanied by

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a document certified by an officer that identifies the obsolete or surplus goods; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a list of the documents required under Part I of the Accounting for Imported Goods and Payment of Duties Regulations that relate to the importation of those goods.

Subsection.Text: Where an officer is not available to certify the document referred to in paragraph (1)(a), other non-certified documentation that contains similar information may be substituted for it.

Section.Text: These Regulations come into force on January 1, 1998.
